integration_patterns: Messaging patterns for patient data exchange

evidence.claim: pVerify utilizes AWS services including RDS and Lambda for scalable cloud infrastructure.
The company mentions HIPAA compliance and various transaction sets related to EDI and FHIR in their documentation.
pVerify integrates using REST APIs for exchanging medical and patient data as specified in FHIR standards.
Details on X12 transaction sets used for health insurance eligibility checks are provided on their site.
Integration middleware is leveraged for seamless EHR interfacing, highlighted in their engineering careers section.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in X12 transactions and values API automation for healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: Messaging patterns for patient data exchange
